title: Afk
body:
Dear Riot,
My name is John and before 2 minutes i was banned for Leaving the game.It it was not my fault.......i am very sorry but i had some problems with my  Internet and i was always trying to fix it......as a result....i got banned......please Riot i am fan of league of legends and i really like this game...please cancel my ban

replies.body:
It doesn't look like you're banned, so I think you may be meaning the Leaverbuster low-priority queues, which are a form of penalty but are not a *ban*.

Unfortunately, we're not able to remove any Leaverbuster penalties for any reason. Regardless of intent, a disconnection negatively impacts *everyone* in the match, therefore they're all treated equally by the system.

Let me know if you have any further issues connecting to games.
